Unfortunately, killing is one of those things that gets easier the more you do it. In a war, all of mankind's worst emotions... worst traits come out. It's easy to forget what a sin is in the middle of a battlefield.

MERYL


But, this isn't a war. It's a terrorist action.

SNAKE


You're just a little jumpy from the combat high. The adrenaline in your blood stream is starting to thin out. Just take it easy.

MERYL


But, I learned all about combat high at the academy...

SNAKE


We'll talk about it later. For now, just think about keeping yourself alive.

MERYL


If I get out of here alive, I'll think about that other stuff.

SNAKE


Okay, let me try to say this another way... Stay the hell out of my way.

MERYL


You're a real bastard... just like my uncle said.

SNAKE


Ha. I told you. The real me is no match for the legend.

MERYL


It looks like you were right.

MERYL


Okay Snake, I'll be a good girl.

SNAKE


We'll link up after I grab the doctor. Then, we'll take care of the detonation code override.

MERYL


Got ya. But listen, I know this area better than you. Call me if you have any questions.

SNAKE


Be careful, okay?

MERYL


After I open up the cargo door, I'll contact you.
Calling Meryl 2

Meryl Opens the Door Codec Call

Meryl puts the balaclava back on.

Snake remembers the way she wiggles her hips when she walks.

MERYL


Snake, I unlocked the cargo door for you.

SNAKE


Thanks. Where are you?

MERYL


Where - I - can - see - ya.

SNAKE


Don't move around too much.

MERYL


Don't worry, I'm disguised in this enemy uniform.

SNAKE


You won't be for long with the way you walk.

MERYL


What does that mean?

SNAKE


Oh... nothing.

MERYL


Listen Snake, the cargo door is like an airlock.

MERYL


It's equipped with infrared sensors. Be careful. If an intruder is sensed, gas is released.

SNAKE


Gas...

MERYL


Okay, so we'll meet at the Nuclear Warhead Storage Building.

SNAKE


Wait! You said you'd stay put and be a good girl!

MERYL


I changed my mind.

SNAKE


Don't get careless. That's when things always turn sour.

MERYL


Sorry, but this is the only way I can figure out whether or not I'm cut out to be a soldier... I gotta get my hands dirty.

SNAKE


These guys are professionals. You're gonna get yourself killed.

MERYL


... See ya there!
M1 Tank Battle 0

Deepthroat Codec Call

Snake emerges from the Tank Hangar. Mandatory incoming call after proceeding north for a bit.
M1 Tank Battle 1

The Tank Rolls In Cutscene

From the north exit of the hangar, it's a straight shot through a canyon to the Nuclear Warhead Storage Building further north.

The sheer walls of the canyon extend all the way to the storage building.

Both the hangar and the storage building exteriors (bedrock) are blanketed by frozen snow. Only the entrances are visible.

The storage building in particular is mostly bedrock. Just the door can be seen, which resembles those used with bomb shelters.

The blizzard continues to send snow everywhere.

POV shot of Snake looking ahead.

He spots a mound of snow. He then sees an M1A2 tank coming over it, spraying snow behind it.

Snake flinches.

The tank comes to a stop on the mound.

The north end of the snowy canyon. The tank's hatch pops open, and Vulcan Raven sticks his head out just enough that he can see ahead, his eyes resting right above the hatch opening. He has a tattoo of a raven on his forehead.

A conspiracy of ravens circles overhead.

Now Raven's entire upper body emerges from the tank. He looks at Snake as he mutters.

DEEPTHROAT


Snake, be careful!

DEEPTHROAT


There are Claymore mines around there.

DEEPTHROAT


Use a Mine Detector!

SNAKE


Who are you?

DEEPTHROAT


Just call me "Deepthroat."

SNAKE


Deepthroat?

SNAKE


The informant from the Watergate scandal?

DEEPTHROAT


Never mind about that.

SNAKE


You're not using burst transmission.

SNAKE


Are you nearby?

DEEPTHROAT


Listen. There's a tank in front of your position waiting to ambush you.

SNAKE


Who are you anyway?

DEEPTHROAT


One of your fans.

RAVEN


This is Raven's territory...

RAVEN


Snakes don't belong in Alaska... I will not let you pass...
Raven peers down into the tank and, without a trace of emotion, issues an order to one of the operators.

The tank's smoothbore gun swivels toward Snake.

It's now pointing right at him.

The gun fires!

Half a second later, the shell lands at Snake's feet!

Snake is blown backward, hitting the ground hard.

Raven laughs triumphantly.

The south side of the canyon. Snake gets back up and observes the tank.

Its gun turns toward Snake's new position.

Raven slams the hatch shut.
M1 Tank Battle 2

VS Tank Post-Victory Cutscene

Snake uses plastic explosives and hand grenades to stop the tank. He loots a card that will open the door to the Nuclear Warhead Storage Building from one of the crewmen.

White plumes of smoke rise from the hatch as well as what remains of the tank's tracks. The vehicle now stands as a temporary monument to the battle that just took place.

Overhead view from the ravens' positions high in the air.

Snake passes through the door to the storage building.

Vulcan Raven sticks his head out the hatch of the M1A2 tank once more.

He's bleeding from his forehead.

A raven dances down and perches on his shoulder.

Raven speaks into his radio, sore about the encounter.

Liquid's voice comes in over the receiver.

RAVEN


Send him a message!

RAVEN


Ha ha ha ha ha ... That's right... You belong on the ground.

RAVEN


You should crawl on the ground like the snake you are!

RAVEN


Come, let's fight!

RAVEN


Well, Boss, I hope you are happy. He got the card.

LIQUID


... We'll play with him a little longer...

RAVEN


You would be wise not to underestimate him.

LIQUID


What did you think of him?

RAVEN


He is just as you said.

RAVEN


In battle, he is as if possessed by a demon. Much like you. I would expect no less.
Ocelot cuts into the conversation.

Raven closes the hatch.

The raven that was perched on his shoulder flies away, cawing ominously.
Footnotes

1
Medical treatment that repairs genes responsible for disease.
2
Acronym for Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency. Conducts R&D on technology with military applications.
3
Acronym for continuity of government. A procedure whereby in the event of a nuclear attack on the United States, a group of around 100 government officials are to take refuge in underground bunkers to ensure the country's government will continue to operate.
4
Acronym for the National Security Agency. An intelligence gathering agency for the United States Department of Defense. Established in 1952, it specializes in communications intelligence activities aimed at protecting America's national security, through wiretapping, spy satellites, and other resources.
5
Acronym for the Defense Intelligence Agency. Operating under the direct supervision of the United States Secretary of Defense, the DIA is an umbrella organization that exercises authority over the intelligence agencies of the Army, Navy, and Air Force.
6
Acronym for a group of banned weapons—nuclear, biological, chemical.
7
Acronym for the British Army's Special Air Service, one of the most elite counter-terrorism units in the world.
8
Acronym for the Secret Intelligence Service, a British intelligence agency also known as MI6 (Military Intelligence, Section 6). The equivalent to the CIA, it engages in foreign intelligence gathering.
9
The headquarters building for the United States Department of Defense, its name coming from the shape of the building. The nerve center of America's national defense.

OCELOT


You see? I told you so. But I will kill him.

RAVEN


So, General Ivan, I hear he took your hand as well as your dignity?

OCELOT


Watch your tongue, Shaman!

RAVEN


In the language of the Sioux people, "Sioux" means snake. It is known as an animal to be feared.

OCELOT


Well, Snake is mine now... When I meet him next, I'll take special care of him.

LIQUID


Not yet. Don't kill him yet...

RAVEN


He and I will meet again in battle.

OCELOT


Same prediction as always?

RAVEN


Yes. The raven on my head... It thirsts for his blood.
Codec Conversations

Cargo dock basics

*Second and subsequent times

*First time only
In the water

Near puddle



Near elevator


*First time only

*If the elevator has arrived

*If the elevator hasn't arrived

*If the elevator has arrived, but it won't move since the player has been spotted by the enemy

CAMPBELL


Snake, don't forget this is a covert operation. There are lots of bad guys and only one of you. If you're spotted, you'll be surrounded before you know it.

NAOMI


If that happens, you're finished.

CAMPBELL


First go to the elevator in the back. Take it up to the ground floor. Then look for the DARPA Chief.

CAMPBELL


Snake, you have to crawl to get through there. First crouch down by pressing the Crawl Button and then use the Directional Button to crawl in the direction you want.

NAOMI


Be careful though. Crawling is slow and you can't attack when you're doing it either.

CAMPBELL


You can stand up by pressing the Crawl Button again.

CAMPBELL


The O2 Gauge is automatically displayed whenever you're underwater or surrounded by gas. It represents one breath.

CAMPBELL


When the O2 Gauge reaches zero, your Life Gauge will begin to go down.

CAMPBELL


Snake, don't run over puddles.The splashing sound might alert your enemies. Be careful.

CAMPBELL


Snake, there's an elevator there you can take up to the ground.

CAMPBELL


Get on the elevator. It should take you right to the front of the Nuclear Weapon Disposal Facility. Be careful, though.

CAMPBELL


You'll just have to wait for the elevator to come down. You'd better hide somewhere.

CAMPBELL


Are you being chased, Snake? The elevators won't work when you're in either Evasion or Alert Mode. Shake the enemies off somehow.
•Campbell

Near door or duct (incoming call)

CAMPBELL


Snake, your mission is to infiltrate, not to fight. Don't let the enemy see you.

CAMPBELL


You didn't waste any time in getting spotted, did you?

CAMPBELL


Too bad, it looks like your cover is blown. Proceed with extreme caution.

CAMPBELL


First you've got to rescue the DARPA Chief. Infiltrate the building in front. Look for some way to get in.

CAMPBELL


Snake, they're using a searchlight to sweep the area. Make sure you stay out of the beam.

CAMPBELL


There's no turning back now, Snake. You've got a job to do and you're our only hope. The world is counting on you.

CAMPBELL


It looks like a cargo truck.

CAMPBELL


They must use it for transporting goods around the base.

CAMPBELL


Snake, why don't you try to hide in the truck? If you disguise yourself as part of the cargo, you might be able to use the truck to get around.

CAMPBELL


Snake, you'll never be able to get through the front door. Find some other way to get in.

CAMPBELL


That base must have some kind of ventilation system to recirculate the air. There should be air ducts around there somewhere.

CAMPBELL


They must need a lot of power to run the base. There's probably a diesel generator somewhere. And since generating electricity requires oxygen, there must be exhaust openings for that too.

CAMPBELL


You're not going to believe this, but they shot down the F-16s we were using as a diversion....with a Hind D! Then we got a message from Liquid. He said if we try something like that again, he'll launch the nuke!

CAMPBELL


Snake, hurry up and get in there! That Hind will be coming back soon.

In front of the elevator

Before the DARPA Chief's location cutscene

CAMPBELL


Watch out for that surveillance camera. You can probably jam it temporarily with your Chaff.

CAMPBELL


There should be a blind spot underneath that camera. You'll be okay if you stay flat up against the wall.

CAMPBELL


Don't make too much noise or you'll be spotted. Be careful when you're walking on that floor.

CAMPBELL


Even though the Genome Soldiers are strengthened by gene therapy, they still need to sleep. You can move safely while they're napping.

NAOMI


The Genome Soldiers were specially trained so they can enter into a light sleep any time and still remain in attack posture. Be careful not to make noise when you're near them.

CAMPBELL


When they're yawning, their eyes are closed, so they shouldn't be able to see you. Be careful with your timing and you'll be okay.

CAMPBELL


Good, you've got yourself a weapon. To use it, first hold down the Weapon Equip Button to enter "Weapon Mode." Then select the weapon you want with the Directional Button.

CAMPBELL


After you've selected the weapon you want, let go of the Weapon Equip Button to exit "Weapon Mode." The weapon you selected should appear in your hand. To use the weapon, follow the directions displayed in the window.

CAMPBELL


If you use the Weapon Quick Change Button, you can equip your weapon more quickly. While you're barehanded, press the Weapon Quick Change Button to equip the last weapon you used. Press the Weapon Quick Change Button while you're holding a weapon to be barehanded again.

CAMPBELL


Don't fire your gun needlessly or you might be discovered. If you had a gun with a suppressor, it would be a different story...

CAMPBELL


If you have any questions about weapons or equipment, you should ask our military analyst, Nastasha. Her frequency is 141.52.

CAMPBELL


Snake, use the elevator to move from floor to floor.

CAMPBELL


To call the elevator, press the button on the nearby control panel by pressing the Action Button. The elevator should show up in no time.

CAMPBELL


Snake, first you've got to find the DARPA Chief. Look for clues.

Use the elevator to change floors. To select the floor you want to go to, use the control panel inside the elevator, on the left.

CAMPBELL

CAMPBELL


Be careful. The elevator won't work in either Alert Mode or Evasion Mode.

CAMPBELL

Armory – FAMAS

CAMPBELL


If you've got a question about FOX-HOUND, ask Dr. Naomi.

NAOMI


Revolver Ocelot is a former member of Spetsnaz. After the fall of the Soviet Union, he apparently served in the Russian Tax Police's elite swat team.

NAOMI


After that, he joined the SVR, the Russian Foreign Intelligence Agency, which was formerly a part of the KGB.

NAOMI


But according to my sources, he was dissatisfied with the rigid system of the KGB and wanted to get out. That's when he was recruited by FOX-HOUND.

NAOMI


He's a gun fanatic and totally obsessed with cowboy movies and spaghetti westerns. He's also something of a sadist... he learned the most advanced torture techniques while he was with Spetsnaz.

CAMPBELL


Yeah, he had plenty of practice. The Lubianka Prison is located right there inside KGB headquarters.

CAMPBELL


Make sure President Baker doesn't get hurt. If he's killed, it's all over. Try not to cross over that yellow line or you might set off the explosion.

CAMPBELL


In a gunfight, reloading is usually the most dangerous time. But he loves it. Use that to your advantage.

CAMPBELL


You'll have to take him out when he's reloading. Can you see where his number of remaining bullets is displayed on the screen? Wait for the right moment and then take him out!

CAMPBELL


You might also try to faze him with a Stun Grenade.

CAMPBELL


If you get too close to Ocelot, he'll run away and shoot you from distance. So be careful.

CAMPBELL


Don't forget that President Baker is there. He's wrapped up in C4, so don't use any type of explosive near him.

CAMPBELL


Snake, there are gun cameras set up there. If they detect you, they'll open fire.

CAMPBELL


Stay out of the cameras' field of vision. You could also try to jam them with Chaff.

CAMPBELL


It looks like the place is protected by infrared sensors. Somehow, you'll have to make it past the beams.

Colonel, I got a Codec call from someone outside this operation!

CAMPBELL

MEI LING


Well, if somebody knows your frequency, they can call you. But the question is how did he learn it...? It's top secret information...

SNAKE


So you mean someone leaked the information?

MEI LING


That's the only explanation I can think of...

SNAKE


Mei Ling, do you know where that transmission originated from?

MEI LING


I'm sorry. The radio waves were too weak to locate their source. But I'm sure he's near you... somewhere on the base.

Snake, you'll have to go through the mine field to advance.

CAMPBELL


You can't get to the Warhead Storage Building unless you beat the tank, Snake. You've got to destroy it.

Sorry. The Soliton Radar won't work in a narrow space.

MEI LING


Too much harmonic resonance. The radio waves produce interference and we can't analyze the topographic data. Try to hang on until you get to a more open space. Okay?

MEI LING


You found out where the DARPA Chief is! With his nanomachine transmitter, he should show up as a green dot on your radar when you get close. Try to find him.

MEI LING


Look at the radar! It's picking up the DARPA chief. He's the green dot. Hurry and rescue him.

MEI LING


The DARPA Chief. Poor man... He has a heart attack right after you save him...

MEI LING


I'm getting a bad feeling about this, Snake. Maybe you should let me save your mission.
