•Otacon


Prior to Entering Metal Gear Hangar

Underground warehouse – Raven battle

After Post-Raven's Death Codec call

*First time only

*Second and subsequent times

OTACON


Snake, that's the relay point between elevator No.1 and elevator No.2.

SNAKE


Why was it set up this way?

OTACON


Well, for a long time it had been set up so that you could take one elevator all the way to the bottom, but I heard that they changed it because of something to do with the structural integrity of the rock.

OTACON


The No.2 elevator is next to you, right? Transfer to that one.

OTACON


If you take that elevator down, you'll wind up in the warehouse. Metal Gear's underground maintenance base is just past there.

SNAKE


Crows...

OTACON


What?

SNAKE


There are a lot of crows here.

OTACON


There were crows around from before. But for some reason they started to really increase in number about the same time that FOX-HOUND came to the base. It's really weird. I wonder what it could mean...?

SNAKE


What the hell are all these crows doing around here?

OTACON


Crows?... You got me.

OTACON


But for some reason they started to really increase in number about the same time that FOX-HOUND came to the base. It's really weird. I wonder what it could mean...?

OTACON


That room is still under construction because their main priority was to finish Metal Gear's underground base. But the good thing is, with all those containers, it should be easy to hide, right?

OTACON


I don't know anything about Dr. Naomi, so there's not much I can say...

OTACON


But, Snake, I think you'd better leave that to Colonel Campbell. Don't you think you'd better just get to the Control Room?
•Otacon

Prior to Metal Gear Battle

Underground base 1F

*After Otacon Codec call 1

Underground base – after Otacon Codec call 1

Underground base – after Otacon Codec call 2

Underground base – after Otacon Codec call 3
*First time only

OTACON


In the meantime, you should head to the control room.

OTACON


That's where the emergency PAL code override system is.

OTACON


The Control Room is on the third floor of the base you're in.

OTACON


Do you see that ladder next to Metal Gear?

OTACON


You can climb up there.

SNAKE


Otacon. How's it going?

OTACON


Not yet. Give me a little more time.

SNAKE


Got it yet?

OTACON


Please, Snake, give me a little more time.

SNAKE


How about it? Did you find the override system file?

OTACON


Not yet. I need a little more time.

OTACON


Well, I found lots of information about that new nuclear weapon...

OTACON


There are four stages involved in launching a ballistic missile. The first one is the Boost Stage. It starts at the point the missile is launched and ends after all the rocket fuel is burned and the missile is propelled into the exosphere.

OTACON


The next stage is the Post-Boost Stage. It starts after all the fuel is burned and ends after the re-entry vehicle is ejected. Next is the Intermediate Course Stage. It takes place after the re-entry vehicle is ejected and lasts until the missile enters the exosphere.

OTACON


Then comes the Final Stage. It starts when the re-entry vehicle enters the exosphere and it lasts until it reaches its ultimate target on the ground.

OTACON


Missile defense systems use military satellites to detect rocket emissions during the initial Boost Stage of a missile. But this new nuclear weapon employs the rail gun's ability to fire projectiles at ultra-high velocities, instead of using a rocket.

OTACON


That's why it can't be detected by today's missile defense systems!

OTACON


And on top of that, the re-entry vehicle also uses Stealth technology... It's so accurate that its fifty percent zone comes close to 50 meters. That's as good as the best ICBM.

SNAKE


A highly accurate, undetectable, uninterceptable nuclear weapon. We wouldn't even be able to tell where it came from...

In front of control room

*First time only

Underground base – basics

After retrieving PAL Key

OTACON


And that's not all. A standard ballistic missile uses a 2-stage or a 3-stage solid fuel rocket for its propulsion system.

OTACON


Besides costing lots of money, safely maintaining the solid rocket fuel and readying the missile for launch requires a lot of work.

OTACON


But a railgun-launched nuclear warhead avoids all of those problems. And it's cheap too.

SNAKE


It's the perfect nuke. A general's dream...

OTACON


And the world's nightmare.

SNAKE


Did you find the file for the override system?

OTACON


Just wait a little longer.

OTACON


I found out a lot about the arms industry though...

OTACON


After the Cold War ended, the United States slashed its defense budget by more than 15%. Naturally, the arms industry was severely affected.

OTACON


It resulted in an orgy of mergers and acquisitions. Some of the big arms conglomerates today are made up of what 10 years ago would have been 20 or more smaller arms companies.

OTACON


ArmsTech is one of those. But we lost our bid to produce the U.S. Air Force's next line of fighter jets. Then we took a stab at civilian applications, but that was a failure too. The company was about to go belly up.

OTACON


Ironically, the Defense Department was in pretty much the same situation. Thanks to big budget cuts, they were forced to turn to the private sector to help fund their weapons development.

OTACON


On top of that, the government began to actively export their advanced weapons technology to the private sector... in order to maintain a high standard of quality in the country's defense armaments.

OTACON


Eventually they decided on a joint development project for new weapon systems between the DOD and the private sector. And... since both sides were in such bad financial shape, that's where all the backscratching came in.

OTACON


So there was another reason for the joint development of Metal Gear, huh. It wasn't just President Baker trying to keep ArmsTech afloat...

OTACON


The terrorists are finished inputting the detonation codes!

OTACON


The only way to stop the launch now is to re-input the detonation codes to lock the detonation mechanism. You need that key to do it. Find that key, Snake! There's no other way!

OTACON


You found the card key, right? First comes the room temperature key. Put it into the far left terminal in the Control Room.
After locating PAL Key, first time only
If PAL Key is something other than room temperature

After inputting room temperature key, before freezing key

After freezing key, before inputting it

If key returns to room temperature
After FoxDie Codec call
*First time only

After inputting frozen key, before warming key

After warming key, before inputting it

After Naomi's Confession Codec call

*First time only

OTACON


That key is actually an IC card. Its connector pins and main body are made of a shape memory alloy.

OTACON


It's designed so that unless it has been changed to the correct shape, it won't be recognized by the PAL code input terminal in the Control Room and the detonation code won't be entered.

OTACON


Snake, the card key changed shape. You've got to change it back to room temperature!

OTACON


Next you've got to cool the card key.

SNAKE


Where should I do that?

OTACON


This is Alaska. Go outside, it's cold everywhere.

OTACON


But you're close to the warehouse where you fought Raven, right? That place is right in the middle of the permafrost layer and there's no heater either.

OTACON


Snake, it looks like you changed the card key's shape correctly. Go and put it into the middle terminal in the Control Room. Before it warms up and changes back to its original shape.

OTACON


Snake, look at the card key. It changed back! You have to change it again!

OTACON


Naomi's an enemy spy!? ... I can't believe it!

SNAKE


I don't want to believe it either, but...

OTACON


Snake, leave it to Colonel Campbell. You've got to concentrate on re-inputting that detonation code.

SNAKE


You're right...

OTACON


Somewhere warm? What about the blast furnace? But the problem is if you go through a cold place on the way back, the card key might change shape. You need to hurry on the way back.

OTACON


It looks like you changed the shape correctly. The last card key goes in the far right terminal in the Control Room.

OTACON


But be careful. If you're in a cold place for too long, it'll change back to its original shape. You need to hurry.

OTACON


I can't really blame Dr. Naomi... I feel sorry for her.

OTACON


... Ever since I was a little kid, always hated my first name.

SNAKE


Hal, isn't it?

*Second and subsequent times, if key has been warmed

*If key hasn't been warmed

After opening control room door
•Otacon

Prior to Liquid Snake Battle

Metal Gear battle – how to fight it

OTACON


Yeah... But I'm not a computer, I'm a human...

OTACON


... My grandfather taking part in the Manhattan Project... my father being born on the day of the Hiroshima bomb... I hated every part of that.

OTACON


My name, my father, my grandfather... It felt like all those things were a ball and chain around my legs, dragging me down..

OTACON


But now that I think about it, I realize that I was blessed.

OTACON


At least I know who I am... where I came from...

OTACON


But Dr. Naomi didn't even know who her parents were, what her real name was. She must have been a very lonely little girl...

SNAKE


Otacon...

OTACON


... Sorry, Snake. I guess right now you should focus on re-inputting those PAL codes.

OTACON


You still haven't input the final card key. Hurry to the Control Room.

OTACON


That's not the right shape. Hurry and warm it up. The blast furnace is probably the best place.

OTACON


What are you doing? The door is open, Snake. Hurry up and go after Liquid!

OTACON


Snake, Rex's armor is impregnable. You can't do any damage with the weapons you've got.

OTACON


Rex uses the latest advances in compound armor. The only way you can pierce it is with a high performance HEAT (high explosive, anti-tank) round.

SNAKE


So what do I do?

OTACON


Rex's pilot seat operates exactly like a VR system.

OTACON


It's got multiple sensors connected to a high tech interface used for the controls.

OTACON


It's completely self-enclosed and shut off from the outside environment.

SNAKE


He's not using his naked eyes?

OTACON


That's right. So if you could somehow destroy the sensors...

OTACON


Do you see that round plate on Rex's left arm?

SNAKE


Yeah, that thing that looks like a shield?

OTACON


That's a radome. If you can destroy that thing, it won't be able to use its electronic equipment.

SNAKE


So he'll be blinded?
Metal Gear battle – after calling Otacon
*First time

*Second time

*Third time

*Fourth time

OTACON


Yeah. Try to hit that radome with a Stinger Missile.

SNAKE


So that will stop it?

OTACON


No, Rex was designed so it can be controlled manually too.

SNAKE


Oh great.

OTACON


The part that looks like a beak is where the pilot seat is. In an emergency it will open up.

OTACON


Rex's armor is perfect. You can't destroy it.

SNAKE


You told me that already.

OTACON


But the interior is a different story.

SNAKE


I get it... First I destroy the radome. That will force him to open up the pilot's seat.

OTACON


Right. If you can shoot a Stinger missile into the cockpit, you'll destroy the computer control system.

SNAKE


You intentionally designed it with a weak point?

OTACON


It's not a weak point. I like to think of it as a character flaw. People just aren't complete without some type of character flaw, don't you think?

SNAKE


I guess so. I owe you one, Otacon.

OTACON


First use a Stinger Missile to destroy the radome and disable its electronics.

OTACON


I saw it in President Baker's top secret files. Rex has a free electron laser mounted on its belly.

OTACON


It's a laser weapon that discharges a laser beam into an electron beam that's been accelerated using giant magnets.

OTACON


It can generate an incredible amount of energy... pretty close to 100 megawatts. That's ten times greater than any other laser out there.

OTACON


If Rex steps on you, it'll be all over. Be very careful when he gets close.

OTACON


Rex is equipped with anti-tank missiles on both of his knees. They're a laser semi-active homing type that doesn't use wires.

OTACON


The shooter uses a laser illuminator to bounce a laser beam off the target. After that, the missile uses the light reflected off the target to home in on it.

OTACON


Fortunately, the missiles are tipped with HEAT rounds and not anti-personnel warheads. But if they hit you directly, you'll be sorry. Be careful.
*Fifth time

*Sixth time


•Otacon


Prior to Jeep Battle

Liquid battle

*A or B, at random

(A)

(B)

OTACON


The rail gun uses magnetism to fire projectiles. By perfecting the process of shell acceleration, the railgun is able to fire a projectile with a muzzle velocity of over 100 kilometers per second.

OTACON


It was originally going to be used, as part of SDI, to shoot down enemy ICBMs outside the atmosphere. It's ironic that now it's going to be used to deliver a nuclear warhead...

OTACON


Rex is the first actual prototype model, but they've been doing virtual prototyping for a while now. They pop it into a VR simulation while it's still in the design phase. That way they can make improvements to the design while testing it under all sorts of simulated conditions.

OTACON


So even though it's a prototype, it's extremely well-designed. Be careful!

OTACON


Snake, I don't know anything about fighting. But, you've got to beat Liquid!

OTACON


If you look like you're about to fall off the back of Rex, press any button rapidly. You'll be able to climb up more quickly.
Ending 1

Outside the Base

The two jeeps crash by the exit, then flip and turn before finally coming to a stop off the road about a dozen meters (39 feet) away.

Snake and his companion's jeep has toppled over, with the underside of the jeep facing the ocean and the backseat of the vehicle hanging over the edge of the cliff.

The jeep isn't lying flat, however—it sits on an uneven patch of ice, meaning it's overturned but resting at an angle.

After bouncing around, Liquid's jeep miraculously landed with all four tires on the ground, but there's no sign of Liquid in the driver's seat. His jeep stopped with its front bumper pushing Snake and his companion's jeep teetering over the edge of the cliff.

The entrance/exit to the base (only one of them) is situated at a flat, square-shaped area 20 meters (66 feet) long in each direction.

Like the rest of the building, its surfaces are concrete and metal, though steps have been taken to camouflage the area (so that it looks like a natural landscape from the air).

The sun is already up, the light from it blinding. Not a cloud can be seen in the brilliant blue sky. The bombing, which had been relentless up until a few moments ago, has stopped—in fact, there isn't a bomber in sight. Several meters (10 feet) below the top of the cliff is frozen sea. The sun glitters off the water in places where there are cracks in the ice or where the ice has melted. There are also protuberances in the ice that were formed by glaciers colliding. The sun has started to dissolve these, and they sparkle like gemstones. From here, the mountains of the Fox Archipelago can be seen clearly beyond the horizon. It's hard to believe this place is its own island.

Snake comes back to life. He lies face-down beneath the jeep, which is tilting down, the mounted machine gun supporting the entire weight of the vehicle. Snake is trapped under the gun—a harness or strap is caught on it. To Snake's left is Otacon/Meryl, still strapped into the driver's seat and hanging upside-down.

Snake tries to crawl out from under the jeep, but his harness/strap is caught on the machine gun.

Otacon/Meryl slowly tries to pull the seatbelt away from them, but it won't budge.

Snake does everything he can to try to get out from under the jeep and see what's going on with Liquid, whose jeep is still resting against theirs following the collision. Snake and his companion's jeep is like an umbrella hanging over them, obstructing their view. Snake can see Liquid's jeep but not Liquid.

Snake lowers his body closer to the ground to try to get a better look out.

Liquid comes tottering over from his jeep. Snake and his companion finally manage to crawl out from under theirs.

Liquid staggers toward them.

Liquid falls to his knees, then collapses to the ground.

SNAKE


Meryl, are you okay?

SNAKE


Otacon, are you okay?

OTACON


... I guess so.

MERYL


... Yeah, just a little shook up.

SNAKE


Meryl, can you move?

SNAKE


Otacon, can you move?

OTACON


... It's no use. I can't move.

MERYL


It's no good. I can't move.

SNAKE


What happened to Liquid?

OTACON


I don't know, but I hope he's dead.

MERYL


I can't see him either...

SNAKE


Liquid is dead...

SNAKE


Uh oh!

LIQUID


Snake!

LIQUID


... Snaaaake...

LIQUID


Fo-... Fox...?
Snake follows this up with:

Liquid twitches face-down on the ground, staring at Snake. Meryl leans into Snake and looks away. (Otacon remains where he is and covers his eyes with his arm.)

Liquid raises his hand, desperately trying to get some words out.

Snake mutters as though he can read Liquid's thoughts:

Meryl covers Snake's mouth with her hand to stop him from saying it. Otacon does nothing.

Liquid (still naked from the waist up) dies, smiling with his last ounce of strength.

Wide shot of Snake and his companion staring at the body of Liquid, who has finally given up the ghost...

Snake looks up at the sky, curious.

Snake's Codec rings. He answers it.
Ending 2

Ending Codec Call

SNAKE


Die...

SNAKE


If he's dead, that means...

OTACON


Don't think about it, Snake.

MERYL


Don't say it, Snake.

LIQUID


...

SNAKE


What happened to the air raid?

SNAKE


No Stealth bombers in sight.

CAMPBELL


Snake, can you hear me?

SNAKE


Colonel!

CAMPBELL


Are you okay?

SNAKE


Colonel, what happened?

CAMPBELL


The Secretary of Defense has been arrested. Early retirement.

SNAKE


Arrested?

CAMPBELL


I was able to get into contact with the President. Metal Gear, the training exercise... all of it... It was all the Secretary of Defense acting alone.

SNAKE


Acting alone?

SNAKE


What happened to the air raid and the nuclear strike?

CAMPBELL


The orders were rescinded. The F117s and the B2 Spirits have returned to the base. Once again, I have complete authority over this operation.

SNAKE


I see...

CAMPBELL


Washington isn't stupid enough to use nukes to cover up a few secrets.

SNAKE


I wonder about that.

CAMPBELL


In any case, the danger's over... Thanks, Snake.
*If Meryl is alive

*If Meryl is dead

*If Meryl is alive

SNAKE


Colonel, you can rest easy. Meryl's fine.

CAMPBELL


Really? Thanks... Thank you, Snake.

SNAKE


Colonel, about Meryl...

CAMPBELL


*with grief* I already know...

CAMPBELL


*sinking into silence* ...

SNAKE


Colonel?

CAMPBELL


Meryl was... my daughter.

SNAKE


What?

CAMPBELL


I didn't find out until recently. I got a letter from her mother... my dead brother's wife... I was going to tell her after this operation was over.

SNAKE


Colonel, I...

CAMPBELL


It's okay, Snake. Thanks, anyway.

CAMPBELL


Snake. I'm sorry I... I kept a lot of things from you.

SNAKE


It's okay, Colonel.

CAMPBELL


Snake, I'm not a Colonel.

SNAKE


Oh that's right.

CAMPBELL


I've got a present for you.

CAMPBELL


There's a snowmobile close to you. Mei Ling saw it on the satellite photos.

CAMPBELL


This time of the year the glaciers are pretty calm. You should be able to ride right out of there.

CAMPBELL


I'll bet the boys at the DIA and the NSA never expected you to come home alive.

SNAKE


Me neither. I better not show my face around here.

CAMPBELL


No danger of that. You two officially died after your jeep sank into the ocean...

SNAKE


That's not too far from the truth.

CAMPBELL


Also there's a helicopter waiting for you on Fox Island.

SNAKE


Dr. Hal Emmerich should be somewhere on the base. I want someone to bring him in.

CAMPBELL


I understand. Leave it to me.

SNAKE


Okay, Roy. Are you going to be okay?

CAMPBELL


Don't worry. I've got an insurance policy... a hard copy of all Mei Ling's data. As long as I've got that, you, me and Mei Ling will be fine.

SNAKE


The battery on these nanomachines will run out soon. They won't be able to follow us.

CAMPBELL


I guess we won't meet again.

SNAKE


Don't worry. I'll pay you a visit sometime.

*Only if Meryl is alive

Naomi comes on.
(Snake doesn't tell her what Fox actually said.)

Naomi cries for a little.

CAMPBELL


Really? I'll look forward to that.

SNAKE


Roy, just tell me one thing.

CAMPBELL


What?

SNAKE


About FoxDie.

CAMPBELL


Meryl will be fine. She wasn't included in its programming.

SNAKE


What about me? It killed Liquid...

CAMPBELL


Naomi said that she wants to talk to you face to face about that.

SNAKE


How is she?

CAMPBELL


Don't worry. Mei Ling's with her right now.

CAMPBELL


I'm switching over to Naomi.

NAOMI


Snake, it's me...

SNAKE


Naomi...

NAOMI


I heard about my brother...

SNAKE


I'm sorry... but he had one last message he wanted to say to you.

NAOMI


What...?

SNAKE


He told me to tell you to forget about him and to go on with your own life.

NAOMI


*moved to tears* Frankie said that?

SNAKE


Yeah. He also said he'll always love you...

SNAKE


Naomi, your brother just saved you, me, and the whole world.

SNAKE


He fought with every ounce of strength in his body.

NAOMI


Maybe... Maybe now he's finally found some peace.

NAOMI


He wasn't really my brother anymore... Ever since he fought with you in Zanzibar he's been like a ghost.

NAOMI


A ghost looking for a place to die...

SNAKE


Naomi, Liquid died from FoxDie too. What about me? When am I gonna go?

NAOMI


That's up to you.

SNAKE


What do you mean?

NAOMI


Everybody dies when their time's up...

SNAKE


Yeah, so when's mine up?

NAOMI


It's up to you how you use the time left to you.

NAOMI


Live, Snake. That's all I can say to you.

SNAKE


...
Ending 3

Ending Cutscene (Outside the Base)

Snake and Otacon/Meryl start walking.

They look at the jeep wreckage and Liquid's body as they walk past them. Snake and his companion continue down a relatively gentle slope of the cliff, then look for the point Campbell was talking about.

Snake peeks into a hollow in the cliff, where he finds the snowmobile. Otacon/Meryl rejoices. They push the snowmobile out onto the ice and look it over. Snake tries starting it up. It works.

Naomi speaks over the Codec.

Naomi's Codec message ends.

NAOMI


Each person is born with their fate written into their own genetic code... It's unchangeable, immutable...

NAOMI


But that's not all there is to life. I finally realized that.

NAOMI


I told you before. The reason that I was interested in genes and DNA.

NAOMI


Because I wanted to know who I was... where I came from.

NAOMI


I thought that if I analyzed my DNA I could find out who I was, who my parents were. And I thought that if I knew that, then I'd know what path I should take in life.

NAOMI


But I was wrong. I didn't find anything. I didn't learn anything.

NAOMI


Just like with the Genome Soldiers... You can input all the genetic information, but that doesn't make them into the strongest soldiers.

NAOMI


The most we can say about DNA is that it governs a person's potential strengths... potential destiny.

NAOMI


You mustn't allow yourself to be chained to fate... to be ruled by your genes. Humans can choose the type of life they want to live.

NAOMI


Snake, whether or not you're in the FoxDie program isn't important.

NAOMI


The important thing is that you choose life...

NAOMI


And then live!

NAOMI


Don't you think, Snake?

NAOMI


Don't worry. I'm going to choose life too.

NAOMI


Until today, I've always looked for a reason to live. But from here on, I'm going to just live.

NAOMI


Genes exist to pass down our hopes and dreams for the future through our children.

NAOMI


Living is a link to the future. That's how all life works.

NAOMI


Loving each other, teaching each other... That's how we can change the world.

NAOMI


I finally realized it. The true meaning of life...

NAOMI


Thank you, Snake.
Ending 4

Meryl Alive Ending Cutscene (Outside the Base)

Snake is sitting in the driver's seat. Meryl gets on the back seat.

Meryl discovers a bonus item the player can use in second and subsequent playthroughs.

It's the Infinity Bandana, which gives the player infinite ammo for all weapons.

Meryl leans forward and comes out with some questions.

Snake stares off into the distance as he answers.
Snake speaks, looking into Meryl's eyes.

Snake finishes his final prep with the snowmobile.

This wasn't the answer Meryl was expecting. After a moment of confusion, she smiles.

Snake looks across the field of ice, which extends as far as the eye can see.

Snake repeats this for himself.

Off in the horizon, they see a caribou mother and her calf. They stretch their necks, looking over at Snake and Meryl with curiosity. Meryl points at them and speaks.

MERYL


Look. I found this.

SNAKE


Let's keep it. As a reminder.

MERYL


Of what? A reminder of a successful mission or the first time we met?

SNAKE


A reminder of how to live.

MERYL


?

SNAKE


Until today, I've lived only for myself. Survival has been the only thing I cared about in my life.

MERYL


That's not just you. That's how everyone is.

SNAKE


I only felt truly alive when I was staring Death in the face.

SNAKE


I don't know, maybe it's written into my genes.

MERYL


What about now? What do your genes say about your future now?

SNAKE


Maybe it's time I live for someone else.

MERYL


Someone else?

SNAKE


Yeah. Someone like you... Maybe that's the real way to live.

MERYL


So... where to, Snake?

SNAKE


David. My name is David...

MERYL


Okay, so where to, Dave?

SNAKE


Hmmm. I think it's time we look for a new path in life.

MERYL


A new path?

SNAKE


A new purpose.

MERYL


Will we find it?

SNAKE


We'll find it.

SNAKE


I know we'll find it.

MERYL


What are those?

SNAKE


Caribou. To the Aleutians, the caribou is a symbol of life.

Meryl wraps her arms around Snake's waist.

Snake places a hand on her arm.

Snake looks up at the big blue Alaskan sky and says with feeling:

Snake looks back at Meryl.

Meryl rests her face against Snake's back. She feels not just the heat from his body, but also a heart with a newfound passion for life.

Snake looks ahead and says serenely:

The snowmobile races off, taking the two of them across a field of ice without roads...
Ending 5

Meryl Dead Ending Cutscene (Outside the Base)

Snake is sitting in the driver's seat. Otacon gets on the back seat.

Otacon leans forward and asks a question.

SNAKE


It'll be spring here soon...

MERYL


For us too...

SNAKE


Yeah. Spring brings new life to everything.

SNAKE


It's a time for hope.

SNAKE


I've lived here a long time...

SNAKE


But Alaska has never looked more beautiful.

SNAKE


The sky... the sea... the caribou... and most of all...

SNAKE


You...

MERYL


I think I'm gonna like this new life...

SNAKE


C'mon. Let's enjoy life...

SNAKE


Until today, I've lived only for myself. Survival has been the only thing I cared about in my life.

OTACON


That's not just you. That's how everyone is.

SNAKE


I only felt truly alive when I was staring Death in the face.

SNAKE


I don't know, maybe it's written into my genes.

OTACON


What about now?

SNAKE


I want to enjoy life. I really do. How about you, Otacon?

OTACON


Me? I feel like a new man.

SNAKE


So what are you going to do? Continue your research?

OTACON


No, I'm finished with science... I'm interested in human psychology now.

SNAKE


Sounds good...

OTACON


The whole reason I got into science in the first place was cause I was no good with people.

OTACON


I was scared of them. I was scared of life.

OTACON


I thought that I could never understand them cause they're so illogical.

They share a laugh, though it's tinged with a sadness over those they lost.

The player receives the Stealth Camo bonus item for second and subsequent playthroughs.

Snake finishes his final prep with the snowmobile.

This wasn't the answer Otacon was expecting. After a moment of confusion, he smiles.

They enjoy a good laugh.

Snake looks across the field of ice, which extends as far as the eye can see.

Snake repeats this for himself.

The snowmobile races off, taking the two of them across a field of ice without roads...


Ending 6


Final Ending Cutscene

Music starts (Celtic song): "The Best Is Yet to Come."

Vocals: Aoife Ní Fhearraigh

Japanese subtitles of the lyrics appear in the upper right (like they do in movies).

News footage (live-action color footage) of the Alaskan wilderness.

OTACON


But I've finally learned how to like people. I'm not afraid anymore.

SNAKE


You and I are more alike than I thought...

OTACON


I'm just tired of always being a spectator in life. I'm ready to live.

OTACON


I'm gonna stand on my own two feet. I'm not gonna hide anymore.

SNAKE


You're giving up your stealth camo?

OTACON


Huh? Oh yeah...

OTACON


You can have it.

OTACON


... So, this is where we say goodbye to our loves as well...

SNAKE


...

OTACON


Want me to drive?

SNAKE


No thanks. I'd rather do it myself.

OTACON


No problem. Where to, Snake?

SNAKE


My real name is David, Otacon.

OTACON


I'm Hal, Dave.

SNAKE


Oh, that's right... Hal. Hal and Dave? That's a good one.

SNAKE


Maybe we should take a trip to Jupiter...

OTACON


So where are you going, Dave?

SNAKE


Hmmm. I think it's time for me to look for a new path in life.

OTACON


A new path?

SNAKE


A new purpose.

OTACON


Will you find it?

SNAKE


I'll find it.

SNAKE


I know I'll find it.
Mountains, magnificent glaciers, herds of caribou, blueberries, etc...

The scene gradually moves inland... The thaw begins.

Staff credits roll over the footage, from bottom to top.

The footage fades out partway through, and the credits continue on a black background.

Directed by Hideo Kojima

End of staff credits.

Fade out in middle of screen.

Display captions conveying the current state of nuclear weapons storage and reduction, the progress of START, CTBT, etc., and the number of decommissioned nuclear weapons as of 1998, etc.

Caption: In the 1980s, there were more than 60,000 nuclear warheads in the world at all times.

Caption: The total destructive power amounted to 1 million times that of the Hiroshima A-bomb.

Caption: In January 1993, START-2 was signed and the United States and Russia agreed to reduce the number of deployed strategic nuclear warheads to 3,000 to 3,500 in each nation by December 31, 2000.

Caption: However, as of 1998, there still exist 26,000 nuclear warheads in the world.
Black Screen

Codec voices over a black background.

NAOMI


The most we can say about DNA is that it governs a person's potential strengths... potential destiny.

NAOMI


You mustn't allow yourself to be chained to fate... to be ruled by your genes.

NAOMI


Humans can choose the type of life they want to live.

NAOMI


Snake, whether or not you're in the FoxDie program isn't important.

NAOMI


The important thing is that you choose life...

NAOMI


And then live!

OCELOT


Yes sir. The entire unit was wiped out.

OCELOT


Those two are still alive.

OCELOT


The vector? Yes sir, FoxDie should become activated soon...

OCELOT


Yes, sir. I recovered all of Rex's dummy warhead data.

OCELOT


... No, sir. My cover is intact. Nobody knows who I really am.

OCELOT


Yes, the DARPA Chief knew my identity, but he's been disposed of.

OCELOT


Yes.

OCELOT


The inferior one was the winner after all.

OCELOT


... That's right. Until the very end, Liquid thought he was the inferior one.

OCELOT


Yes, sir. I agree completely. It takes a well-balanced individual... such as yourself to rule the world.

OCELOT


No, sir. No one knows that you were the third one... Solidus.

OCELOT


... What should I do about the woman?

OCELOT


Yes sir. I'll keep her under surveillance.

OCELOT


Yes. Thank you. Good-bye. Mr. President.
•Campbell

Opening Tutorials

How to use the Codec

Alert and Evasion Modes

Hand-to-hand combat

*Player hasn't acquired a weapon yet

CAMPBELL


Snake. Just to make sure, let's review how to use the Codec system.

CAMPBELL


Snake, if you want to send a transmission, first press the Codec Button. That will put you in Codec Mode.

CAMPBELL


When you're at the Codec Screen, press the right or left Directional Button to change the frequency. Then press up on the Directional Button or press the Action Button to transmit at that frequency.

CAMPBELL


The Codec also automatically stores the frequencies of the people you've spoken to. To open the Memory Window, press down on the Directional Button at the Codec Screen.

CAMPBELL


The Memory Window will show a list of all the frequencies. All you have to do is to select the frequency you want and press the Action Button to transmit.

CAMPBELL


If you want to switch back to the normal Codec Mode, just press the Codec or Crawl Button.

CAMPBELL


If you're spotted, all the enemies will come to attack you at once. That's Alert Mode.

CAMPBELL


In that case, there are only two ways to get out of danger. Either kill all the enemies that are coming after you, or escape from them for a certain amount of time.

CAMPBELL


You'll see a timer in the upper right radar portion of the screen. That will tell you how much more time you need to stay out of sight in order to get out of Alert Mode.

CAMPBELL


If you can escape until that counter reaches zero, the enemies will stop attacking you and you'll enter Evasion Mode.

NAOMI


But don't relax just because you're in Evasion Mode. The enemies will still be looking for you, so make sure you stay hidden so they can't find you.

NAOMI


When the counter in the radar portion of the screen reaches zero again, the enemies will return to their positions. That's when you can breathe a sigh of relief.

CAMPBELL


In any case, the most important thing is not to let the enemy see you. I want you to avoid any unnecessary combat.

CAMPBELL


You still don't have a weapon. If you get into combat, you'll have to rely on your bare hands.

CAMPBELL


Listen up, Snake. In unarmed combat, your basic weapon is the punch. Press the Action Button. If you press it repeatedly, you can take your enemy out with a combo.

CAMPBELL


Not only that. When you're not holding a weapon, you can do a throw move by getting close to your enemy and pressing the Weapon Button while you hold down the Directional Button. That does more damage than a punch.

CAMPBELL


If you press the Weapon Button without holding down the Directional Button, you can strangle your enemy. You can knock them out for a little while or if you keep doing it, you can take 'em out permanently. The choice is up to you. But use it wisely.
O2 Gauge
*First time only

Intrusion Mode

*First time only

Corner View Mode

*First time only

Stepping left and right in First Person View Mode

Crawling

Looking at Item Boxes in First Person View Mode

Using enemies as a human shield

CAMPBELL


The O2 Gauge is automatically displayed whenever you're underwater or surrounded by gas. It represents one breath.

CAMPBELL


When the O2 Gauge reaches zero, your Life Gauge will begin to go down.

CAMPBELL


Snake, when you enter a narrow space, you'll automatically go into Intrusion Mode. Press up on the Directional Button to go forward and down to retreat backwards. You can also press right or left to face either direction.

CAMPBELL


Advance while hiding yourself. Pay attention to the enemies' actions and make sure you're not discovered.

NAOMI


But be careful. You can't attack while you're in Intrusion Mode either.

CAMPBELL


And even if you go into Intrusion Mode while you're being chased, the enemy's grenades will still follow you.

CAMPBELL


Snake, when you're up against certain walls or obstacles, you can look behind you while you're still hidden. We call that Corner View Mode. Use it skillfully to see the openings in your enemy's actions and avoid being spotted while advancing.

NAOMI


In Corner View Mode you can hit the wall and make a noise, by pressing the Action Button.

SNAKE


So I can trick the enemy and lure him my way, huh.

NAOMI


You're good at tricking people, aren't you?

SNAKE


Only beautiful women like yourself.

CAMPBELL


Snake, when you're in First Person View Mode, you can step to the right by pressing the Weapon Quick Change Button or step to the left by pressing the Item Quick Change Button.

SNAKE


So I can just step out of the shadows and see what's up ahead, huh.

NAOMI


Yes. But remember that when you step out of the shadows you'll be easier to spot. So if you're in danger, let go of the button and get back into the shadows in a hurry, alright?

CAMPBELL


Snake, crawling is an important way to get through tight, narrow spaces. But you won't be able to attack while you're doing it, so be careful.

CAMPBELL


If you want to stand up, press the Crawl Button again.

CAMPBELL


If you find an Item Box, it's a good idea to get close and look at it in First Person View Mode. You'll be able to see what's inside.

CAMPBELL


If you grab your enemy in a choke hold, you'll be able to drag him around. That way, you can use his body as a human shield.
•Campbell

Special Situations

Smoking a cigarette

*First time only

Obtained a cardboard box

In front of a door

*If player doesn't have a card
*If player has a card


•Mei Ling


Post-Save Conversations

Proverbs – early part of the game

(1)

(2)

NAOMI


*disdainfully* Are you smoking?

SNAKE


Yeah, so what?

NAOMI


Didn't you know that cigarettes contain benzopyrene, a chemical that leads to lung cancer?

NAOMI


We now know that when benzopyrene enters the body, it changes to benzopyrene diolepoxide (BPDE) and attaches to the receptors on the P53 gene, the gene which causes lung cancer.

NAOMI


The BPDE attaches to the P53 gene in three specific locations and causes pre-cancerous changes to the lung tissue.

SNAKE


You know a lot about science, but you don't know how good a cigarette tastes in the morning.

CAMPBELL


What have you got there? A cardboard box?

SNAKE


Yeah. Remember that trick?

CAMPBELL


That's the Snake I remember. Those poor fools won't know what hit 'em.

CAMPBELL


Snake, that door is protected by a security system. It won't open without the right security card.

CAMPBELL


You can only open the door with a security card that's got the same or a higher security clearance than the door.

MEI LING


Snake, remember what De Gaulle said, "The graveyards are full of indispensable men."

MEI LING


Snake, you're all alone and surrounded by bad guys. Try to be careful and avoid getting into a fight whenever you can.

SNAKE


You're right. Wow. You know all sorts of great quotes, don't you?

MEI LING


Well, both my parents are from Guangdong, China, but I was born and raised in America. I've always liked reading literature from both sides... Kinda keeps me in touch. I'll share some more quotes with you if you like.

SNAKE


I'm looking forward to it. But to tell you the truth, I'd like to learn more about you.

MEI LING


Well... I'll think about it.

MEI LING


Snake, listen to what Lao-Tze said, "He who knows that enough is enough will always have enough."

MEI LING


Just cause you see an item doesn't mean that you always have to get it.

MEI LING


If you don't really need it, think twice before you stick your neck out. It might not be worth it.
(3)

(4)

(5)

(6)
(7)

Proverbs – middle part of the game

(1)

(2)

(3)

(4)

MEI LING


Snake, like Shakespeare said, "Nought's had, all's spent, where our desire is got without content."

MEI LING


Basically, it means that your desire can get you into trouble if you're not careful.

MEI LING


That goes for items too. Don't get too greedy or you might be sorry. Be careful, Snake.

MEI LING


Snake, in China they say, "You must cross the river before you tell the crocodile he has bad breath." Do you know what that means?

MEI LING


It means that the wise man avoids danger first. Use your brain to avoid traps and stay away from the enemy.

MEI LING


Snake, have you ever heard the saying, "Friendly counsel cuts off many foes"?

MEI LING


It means that a little bit of advice from friends can save you a lot of trouble. You should think about it.

MEI LING


If you're in trouble or if you need some information about something, please contact Colonel Campbell or someone else. Okay?

MEI LING


In my parents' homeland they say, "If there are more wolves, the people are eaten; if there are more people, the wolves are eaten."

MEI LING


That means the side with the greater numbers is usually the winner. You're badly outnumbered Snake... Try not to let them see you.

MEI LING


Snake, like Confucius said, "The cautious seldom err."

MEI LING


If you proceed cautiously, you probably won't make a big mistake. Snake, even after you get used to the mission, don't lose your concentration.

MEI LING


In China, they say, "Rashness brings success to few, misfortune to many."

MEI LING


Snake, go forward when it's safe, but retreat when there's danger. You'll just have to play it by ear depending on the circumstances.

MEI LING


The Chinese say, "It is the strong swimmer who most often drowns."

MEI LING


It is because the strong swimmer overestimates his abilities and underestimates the strength of the river. You are probably quite used to the mission now, but don't get careless.

MEI LING


There's a Chinese proverb, "The mind cannot be in two places at once."

MEI LING


Make sure that you're not thinking of something else during the mission, okay?

MEI LING


"Gather ye rosebuds while ye may, old time is still aflying, and this same flower, that smiles today, tomorrow will be dying."

MEI LING


Snake, laughter is the best medicine.

MEI LING


You should be happy you've got enough free time to play a game. Enjoy yourself, okay?
(5)

(6)

(7)

(8)
Proverbs – final part of the game
(1)

(2)

(3)

(4)

MEI LING


In Paradise Lost, Milton wrote,"Solitude sometimes is best society, and short retirement urges sweet return."

MEI LING


Is that why you came back, Snake? You got tired of your "short retirement" in Alaska, huh?

MEI LING


"The proud man does not eat rotting meat even when hungry, nor steal water from another's well when he thirsts."

MEI LING


But... on the other hand, you were forced to steal or find every item you've got, so I guess I shouldn't say that.

MEI LING


In China, they say, "Once the fox gets his nose in, he'll soon find a way to make his body follow."

MEI LING


That's a perfect description of you. You can do it, Snake. But you've got to be flexible... adapt to each situation uniquely.

MEI LING


"He who is firm in will molds the world to himself."

MEI LING


Don't forget what you're here to do. You've got to seize any opportunities that present themselves.

MEI LING


But I guess I don't have to tell you that, do I?

MEI LING


Snake, in China they say, "When walking through a melon patch, don't adjust your sandals."

MEI LING


That means that when things get really bad, you have to try to remember what's important. Keep things in the proper perspective, okay?

MEI LING


In China, they say, "The snake, knowing itself, strikes swiftly."

MEI LING


It means that if you have confidence that what you are doing is part of your true nature, there should be no hesitation.

MEI LING


I don't know whether your orders are in your true nature or not. But Snake... believe in yourself!

MEI LING


Snake, Leo Durocher said, "Win any way you can. Nice guys finish last."

MEI LING


What about you, Snake? Is that what you think? Is there anything that you wouldn't do to stay alive?

MEI LING


You should think about that, Snake.

MEI LING


Snake, don't give up. Remember Macbeth, act V, scene 3.

MEI LING


"I'll fight, till from my bones my flesh be hack'd, give me my armor."

MEI LING


Everyone is counting on you, Snake....You've got to do it!
(5)

(6)

Caught a cold

(1)

(2)

After Mantis'/Raven's death, first time only
After Wolf's/the Ninja's death, first time only
While locked up

MEI LING


"War he sung, is toil and trouble; honor but an empty bubble."

MEI LING


What about you, Snake? Is your honor just an empty bubble, too?

MEI LING


Snake,"Come, what come may, time and the hour runs through the roughest day."

MEI LING


We're almost out of time, Snake.

MEI LING


Please hurry! You're the only one who can stop them from launching that nuke.

MEI LING


"O, he's a limb, that has but a disease; mortal, to cut it off; to cure it easy."

MEI LING


Snake. You caught a cold, didn't you? Don't you think you'd better take some cold medicine at least?

MEI LING


Snake,"This sickness doth infect. The very life-blood of our enterprise."

MEI LING


That's from Henry IV. Snake, you'd better take that cold medicine and start feeling better. The success of this mission may depend on it.

MEI LING


"The tongues of dying men enforce attention, like deep harmony."

MEI LING


Snake, people don't normally lie with their dying breaths. I think he was telling the truth. Maybe you should believe him.

MEI LING


In China they say, "It's better to live ugly than to die beautiful."

MEI LING


I think it's true. Once you're dead, you'll never have another chance to be happy. I can't understand people who want to die before their time.

MEI LING


Please Snake... promise me that you'll come back alive.

MEI LING


"Where life is more terrible than death, it is then the truest valor to dare to live."

MEI LING


Snake, sometimes living is harder than dying. That's when you really have to be courageous.

MEI LING


It must be terrible for you now. Please... please be brave. I know you'll make it. I believe in you.
•Mei Ling

Special Situations

Second conversation

After player enters the tank hangar
After rescuing the ArmsTech president

MEI LING


How's it going, Snake? Have you gotten used to using the radar yet?

SNAKE


*grateful* Yeah. It's a great system. Not only can I read the topography, but I can monitor the movement of the bad guys too.

MEI LING


*proud* Pretty convenient, huh. It also makes it easy for us to see everything that you're doing.

SNAKE


You're watching everything?

MEI LING


*jokingly* Of course. If you were my boyfriend, you'd never be able to cheat on me.

SNAKE


Being monitored 24 hours a day... that would be like hell.

MEI LING


Don't think of it like that. At least you'd never get lost.

MEI LING


I wish I could send you weapons through this Codec, instead of just data.

SNAKE


That would be nice. I'm starting to feel like a thief already...

SNAKE


Ransacking rooms, rifling through fallen enemies' pockets...

MEI LING


But you have no choice, Snake.

SNAKE


Maybe so, but I think I'm starting to develop kleptomania. I just keep putting things in my pocket.

MEI LING


Snake, what does it feel like to fight?

SNAKE


Why do you ask?

MEI LING


I like to play fighting games.

SNAKE


Games?

MEI LING


Yeah. Fighting games. Since I started this job, I've seen so many people kill each other. But I always see it on a monitor, or in burst transmission.

SNAKE


Not a very good job, huh.

MEI LING


I'm not sure. When you watch it on a monitor, it starts to feel just like a video game.

SNAKE


This is no game! There are no startovers if you make a mistake.

MEI LING


I'm sorry...

SNAKE


Killing's not fun. It's not pretty either, like it looks in those video games.

MEI LING


Okay, Snake... I understand. War's not a game.

SNAKE


Listen, Mei Ling, after this operation is over, I want you to go back to being a normal student. You should be having fun... playing real video games instead of playing war.
After rescuing Otacon
Mei Ling's motivations

Middle part of the game

SNAKE


Mei Ling, how did you get into this line of work?

MEI LING


The truth is... I always wanted to become a fighter pilot.

MEI LING


I fell in love with jets watching them in the movies.

SNAKE


You'd be surprised how many people say the same thing.

MEI LING


But I didn't want to kill people. That's when I heard that the U.S. Air Force needed people to do BDAs, battle damage assessments.

SNAKE


Those are the guys whose job it is to confirm how successful a bombing run was.

MEI LING


Yeah. So I started to do research into aerial photography and air intelligence. I made it my major.

SNAKE


But there are no pilots who only do BDAs...

MEI LING


That's right. But by the time I learned that, I was already an expert in my field.

SNAKE


Mei Ling, you said that you wanted to become a pilot. Did you take an aptitude test?

MEI LING


Well, I've got bad eyes. You probably didn't know it, but I'm wearing contact lenses.

SNAKE


So you failed your aptitude test, huh?

MEI LING


Yeah, it's ridiculous. We're not flying around in biplanes anymore, y'know.

SNAKE


That's right. Today's pilots fly jets that go several times the speed of sound.

MEI LING


Exactly. At those speeds, the naked eye isn't that useful. You need sophisticated electronics to see what's really going on.

SNAKE


So is that why you developed your radar system?

MEI LING


Yeah. I wanted to develop a radar system that would help soldiers make better, more informed decisions.

SNAKE


So your radar shows what's really going on, huh?

MEI LING


It depends on how you interpret it. Like beauty, truth is in the eye of the beholder.

SNAKE


You can say that again.

MEI LING


Don't forget to save your memories of me too.

SNAKE


You can't save memories, even on that system of yours. Memories are fragile things. After you reduce them to binary numbers and send them through the air, they're not memories anymore.

MEI LING


I wouldn't be so sure of that. There's nothing that my systems can't do.

SNAKE


Memories aren't just sounds and pictures. They exist somewhere between the sounds, between the pictures.

MEI LING


I don't get it. Anything can be done digitally.
After shooting down the Hind
*If player has saved a certain number of times or more

If player is smoking despite having been warned by Naomi

SNAKE


If that's true, why don't you go ahead and try to save what I'm thinking right now.

MEI LING


I can't save that type of thing. You have to put it into words at least...

SNAKE


That's right. And that's what memories are... wordless.

MEI LING


I don't know about that...

SNAKE


No matter how far data technology advances, you'll never be able to penetrate the human heart.

MEI LING


You're wrong. It's just a matter of time...

SNAKE


But first you have to try to understand human emotions, Mei Ling.

MEI LING


And how do I do that?

SNAKE


You have to allow yourself to fall in love with someone.

MEI LING


"How do I love thee? Let me count the ways..."

MEI LING


Have you ever heard that? It's Elizabeth Barett Browning.

MEI LING


*embarassed and frantic* Oh uh... don't think too deeply about that one. I'm not sure why I said it...

MEI LING


Snake! Are you smoking a cigarette!?

MEI LING


*reprimands* Cigarettes are poison... They kill people. Didn't you hear what Dr. Naomi said?

MEI LING


"He that cuts off twenty years of life cuts off so many years of fearing death." Is that why you smoke, Snake? You're too afraid of life?
•Mei Ling

Miscellaneous

*When calling, before save menu appears

From early to middle parts of game – cheerful

Tense – when fighting a boss, for example

Second half of game – whenever things are serious

*For example, after it comes to light that Naomi has betrayed Snake and the others, or after it's suspected that Snake is infected with a viral weapon

*If player chose not to save
From opening to middle parts of game – cheerful
Tense – when fighting a boss, for example

Second half of game – whenever things are serious

*For example, after it comes to light that Naomi has betrayed Snake and the others, or after it's suspected that Snake is infected with a viral weapon

What can I do for you, Snake?

What is it, Snake?

MEI LING


What's up, Snake?
